title: fusedfolio
author: fusedfolio
content: Hi!I am looking for a few users who are interested in trying out an "Open Orders" section on FusedFolio. This section lets you view your open orders on all the exchanges you have connected your FusedFolio account to.Anyone who is interested, please send me a PM and mention the names of the Exchanges you would like to try out. No problem if you don't see your exchange on the app yet. Just let me know the ones you are interested in.Cheers!

The problem is inherent to the app itself and not necessarily to the device in concern. There isn't enough space on smaller screens to fit all the columns. That's why the user will need to scroll horizontally to be able to view all the columns. We are still working on the UX though so hopefully we will come up with a solution to this problem.The orders section is in beta phase. We have tested it with a few exchanges so far.The API details pertaining to the exchanges entered by the user are stored in the database in an encrypted format. The users must ensure that they provide read-only access. We have applied security measures to ensure a data breach never happens but it is something that's not inevitable. CoinTracker recently suffered from a hack even with all the precautions. comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Hey OP how exactly does FusedFolio work especially that you say "The platform lets you view your open orders on all the exchanges you have connected your FusedFolio account" but how does this work without giving you our login details to various exchanges and what real benefit does this come with without exposing personal data??

comments.author: fusedfolio
comments.body: Quote from: Woodie on January 10, 2023, 03:54:18 PMHey OP how exactly does FusedFolio work especially that you say "The platform lets you view your open orders on all the exchanges you have connected your FusedFolio account" but how does this work without giving you our login details to various exchanges and what real benefit does this come with without exposing personal data?? Hi. You will need to create an API on the exchange first. Please refer to this post. The API that you create must give read access only.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Woodie on January 10, 2023, 03:54:18 PMHey OP how exactly does FusedFolio work especially that you say "The platform lets you view your open orders on all the exchanges you have connected your FusedFolio account" but how does this work without giving you our login details to various exchanges and what real benefit does this come with without exposing personal data?? Many exchanges provide public APIs that allow third-party platforms to access account data, such as open orders, in a read-only manner. By using these APIs, FusedFolio can access account data without needing a user's login credentials or exposing any sensitive information.
